articles.title: ‘I think he was pleased to see me’: Man wakes up to find Boris Johnson on police raid in his flat

articles.content:
A man has said he thought he was dreaming after waking up to find Boris Johnson in his flat, surrounded by police officers.

articles.title: Ryan Giggs trial: Jury in trial of ex-footballer discharged after failing to reach verdict
articles.description: Former Manchester United star was accused of headbutting ex-girlfriend and using controlling behaviour
articles.content:

articles.author: Ian Lloyd
articles.title: The many faces of Diana, Princess of Wales
articles.description: Diana personified life, with all its richness, variety and flaws. It was inconceivable that the woman we had seen progress from vulnerable ingenue to global superstar was no longer part of our lives, writes Ian Lloyd
